chat.welcomeMessage:
Sannu! üëã Ni ne mataimakinka a noma.

Zan iya taimaka maka da:
‚Ä¢ Amfanin gona, kayan lambu, 'ya'yan itace, da furanni
‚Ä¢ Dabbobi, kaji, da kiwon kifi
‚Ä¢ Maganin kwari da cututtuka
‚Ä¢ Shawarar yanayi da kasuwa

Yaya zan iya taimaka maka yau?

mcp.title: Ayyukan AI
mcp.footer: Samuwar hidima ya dogara da inda kake
mcp.couldNotLoadDetails: Ba a iya …óora cikakken bayanin hidima ba
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} cikin {total} hidimomi suna samuwa a inda kake

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Gano cututtukan shuka da AI ke yi
agrivision.description: Bincika hotunan shuka don gano cututtuka, kwari, da rashin sinadarai masu gina jiki. Samu gane cuta nan take tare da shawarwari na magani da nasihu na kariya.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Soil
isdaSoil.tagline: Halayen Kasa da binciken abinci mai gina jiki ga Afirka
isdaSoil.description: Samu cikakken bayani kan kasa ciki har da pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, da sauran sinadarai masu gina jiki. Yana rufe duk Afirka da ∆ôudurin mita 30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Yanayi na yanzu da hasashen yanayi na duniya
accuweather.description: Samu bayanan yanayi na ainihi ciki har da zafin jiki, danshi, saurin iska, da ruwan sama. Akwai hasashen har zuwa kwanaki 15.

gapWeather.name: GAP Weather
gapWeather.tagline: Hasashen yanayi na noma ga Kenya
gapWeather.description: Hasashen yanayi na musamman don noma a Kenya. Ya ha…óa da evapotranspiration, hasken rana, da hasashen ruwan sama da aka ke…ìe don yanke shawara kan noma.

edacap.name: Yanayin EDACaP
edacap.tagline: Hasashen yanayi na lokaci ga Habasha
edacap.description: Hasashen yanayi na lokaci ciki har da hasashen zafin jiki da ruwan sama. Yana taimaka wa manoma su tsara jadawalin shuka da girbi.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Bayanin yanayi ga wurare na duniya
weatherapi.description: Cikakken sabis na bayanan yanayi wanda ke ba da yanayi na yanzu da hasashen wurare a duk duniya.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Babban tsarin hankali na yanayi tare da hasashen babban ∆ôuduri da ikon hasashen nan take.

feedFormulation.name: Ha…óin Abinci
feedFormulation.tagline: ∆òididdigar abincin dabbobi mafi kyau ga shanu masu nono
feedFormulation.description: ∆òididdige mafi arha ha…óin abinci ga shanu masu nono. Yana la'akari da burin samar da nono, nauyin jiki, da abincin dabbobi na gida da ke akwai.

nextgen.name: Taki Na Zamani
nextgen.tagline: Shawarwari na taki na musamman ga Habasha
nextgen.description: Samu takamaiman shawarwari na taki bisa ga inda kake. Ya ha…óa da shawarwari na taki na halitta (takin zamani, vermicompost) da na sinadarai (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Itacen Shawarar Noma
decisionTree.tagline: Shawarwari na matakin girma ga Kenya
decisionTree.description: Samu shawarwari na sarrafa amfanin gona bisa ga matakin girma da yanayin yanayi na yanzu. Yana taimaka maka ka yanke shawara a kan lokaci don sarrafa kwari, ban ruwa, da girbi.

gapAgriculture.name: Noman GAP
gapAgriculture.description: Gaba…óaya hidimomin bada shawara kan noma don sarrafa amfanin gona da dabbobi.

fallback.description: Ba a samun cikakken bayanin hidima ba.
